mapper.select: select co_email, co_password, co_nickName, co_name, co_birth, co_gender, role, profileImg from CoUser where co_email = #{co_email}
mapper.insert: insert into CoUser (co_email, co_password, co_nickName, co_name, co_birth, co_gender, role) VALUES (#{co_email}, #{co_password}, #{co_nickName}, #{co_name}, #{co_birth}, #{co_gender}, #{role})
